title: UNCOVERED: What Do Trump and Indians Have in Common??
description:
There have been further developments in the Trump raid. HINT: The media lied a lot, and the DOJ looks shadier than before. To help us make sense of it all, we have special guest DONALD TRUMP JR.! Also, the Oscars are apologizing to some Native American broad over something that happened fifty years ago. And we're using pubic hair to sell razors now! #TrumpRaid #FBI #littlefeather
